mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs(num, name, subject, content, pwd, ipAddr) VALUES(bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{pwd}, #{ipAddr})
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM bbs
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM bbs
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
